contents.NAME: [color=#4386c2]Akimi[/color]
contents.DIALOGUE: Oh... wow! Huh? Am I a magical girl now?

contents.NAME: [color=#24ccff]Miku[/color]
contents.DIALOGUE: Congratulations! Now that you're a magical girl, you can make money by completing tasks with your magic!

contents.NAME: [color=#4386c2]Akimi[/color]
contents.DIALOGUE:
So what should I do next?
I'm a bit confused, since, you know....

contents.NAME: [color=#24ccff]Miku[/color]
contents.DIALOGUE: Of course. There'll be a star shower in the forest soon! They'll corrupt the forest with their impure energy if left alone. That would be dangerous.

contents.NAME: [color=#24ccff]Miku[/color]
contents.DIALOGUE: These stars are pretty weak, so getting close to them is enough for your pure energy to take care of them.
You'll have to enter the shower, but be careful and [i]dodge the stars[/i] while you're in there. You'll be running [i]left and right[/i].. good luck!
